title: Der.Tiger.von.Eschnapur.1959.German.Eng.Subs.1080p.BluRay.x264-R
description:
Der Tiger von Eschnapur / The Tiger of Eschnapur

================================================
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052295/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052295/</a>

================================================

The tale begins when architect Harold Berger 
(Paul Hubschmid) arrives in India to meet with 
Maharaja Chandra (Walter Reyer), for whom he 
will build schools and hospitals. En route to 
the Maharaja's palace, Berger meets a dancer 
named Seetha (Debra Paget) and saves her from a 
tiger. Seetha, whose father was European, is 
promised to the Maharaja, but she and the 
architect begin to fall in love. Predictably, 
this leads to a buildup of tension between 
Chandra and Berger, helped along by scheming 
palace courtiers. The film is also filled with 
action, and a highlight of it is Seetha's first 
ritual dance. At the end of Tiger, Seetha and 
Berger are imprisoned but escape into the 
desert just as Berger's sister and her husband, 
also an architect who works with Berger, arrive 
in Eschnapur. Chandra informs them the plans 
have changed; he now wants a tomb to be built.
